LanguageData.RedMoyo_BodyStrap.label: 深海拘束带
LanguageData.RedMoyo_BodyStrap.description: 用于拘束奴隶的绑带装,并预留了牵引与多人连缚用的金属环.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_BobySuit.label: 深海紧身衣
LanguageData.RedMoyo_BobySuit.description: 用于保护茉约于环境温度的贴身衣物.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_TacticalStrap.label: 深海战术绑带
LanguageData.RedMoyo_TacticalStrap.description: 深海军事单位的制式全身战术带，能在不阻碍行动的状况下配戴辅助用品
LanguageData.RedMoyo_PoliceUniform.label: 深海警服
LanguageData.RedMoyo_PoliceUniform.description: 深渊制式警服,能够抵御一些小型生物的撕咬与小口径枪击.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_HoloCamisole.label: 深海投影服
LanguageData.RedMoyo_HoloCamisole.description: 使用深海技术制造的可穿戴立场投影投射器,为了避免穿戴者感觉没有穿衣服而害羞附赠了一双过携袜.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_ExoSkeleton.label: 深海外骨骼动力服
LanguageData.RedMoyo_ExoSkeleton.description: 直连神经控制的外骨骼动力装置,能够极大加强穿戴者的机动性,然而因为反馈系统的直连因此当服装受损时也会受到痛苦.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_WorkSuit.label: 深海工作服
LanguageData.RedMoyo_WorkSuit.description: 为深海工程人员设计的吊带式工作服,有许多方便放东西的口袋..
LanguageData.RedMoyo_OfficerCape.label: 深海军官斗篷.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_OfficerCape.description: 深渊军事力量制式的军官服装,除了如同防弹衣的性能外最重要的还是帅气..
LanguageData.RedMoyo_TacticalGears.label: 深海战术装具
LanguageData.RedMoyo_TacticalGears.description: Standard tactical equipment for abyss military units, including integrated bulletproof breastplates and straps mounted with various combat equipment
LanguageData.RedMoyo_Helmet.label: 深海军用头盔
LanguageData.RedMoyo_Helmet.description: A lightweight combat helmet for moyo marines.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_PanHat.label: 深海警帽
LanguageData.RedMoyo_PanHat.description: A form of headgear worn by armed forces and law enforcement agencies in moyo society. decrease social impact.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MeleeMask.label: 深海防弹目镜
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MeleeMask.description: A mask that protect eyes in close combat.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_SniperMask.label: 深海狙击目镜
LanguageData.RedMoyo_SniperMask.description: 拥有内建射控辅助系统的全覆式面罩
LanguageData.RedMoyo_GasMask.label: 深渊防毒面具
LanguageData.RedMoyo_GasMask.description: 侵入式设计的防毒面具,能够有效的抵御有毒物质的侵入....但戴着就是不舒服.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_TacticalHeadSet.label: 深海战术耳机
LanguageData.RedMoyo_TacticalHeadSet.description: The tactical headset of the armed forces and law enforcement agencies, in addition to being able to communicate remotely, can also reduce mental sensitivity by playing specific audio
LanguageData.RedMoyo_AbyssArmour.label: 深渊装甲服
LanguageData.RedMoyo_AbyssArmour.description: Heavy diving gear modified from abysstech diving gear, exceptionally tough.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_AbyssHelmet.label: 深渊装甲盔
LanguageData.RedMoyo_AbyssHelmet.description: Helmet paired with the Abyss diving suit.
